name: .CMPROJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .CMPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a CMPROJ file with the macOS version of TechSmith Camtasia. To open a CMPROJ file with Camtasia, select File → Open Project.
Since CMPROJ files are macOS packages, you can manually view the contents of a CMPROJ file in macOS by right-clicking the file and selecting Show Package Contents.

In Windows, you can open a CMPROJ file as a folder by double-clicking it. You can then navigate its contents, which may include a TSCPROJ file, a "media" folder (storing media files in the project), a "recordings" folder (storing .TREC video recordings), and other files.
The macOS version of Camtasia can convert a CMPROJ file to various file types, including the following formats:
You can also export a CMPROJ file as a .CAMPACKAGE to back up or share the project and other resources with other Camtasia users. To do this, select File → Export → Package.
